refnamediv.refpurpose: object representing an OpenGL shader program

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstGLShader * gst_gl_shader_new (GstGLContext *context);
refsect2.para: Note: must be called in the GL thread

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_new_default ()
refsect2.para: Note: must be called in the GL thread

entry.para: a GError that is filled on failure

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a default shader or NULL on failure.

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_new_link_with_stages ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstGLShader * gst_gl_shader_new_link_with_stages (GstGLContext *context, GError **error, ...);
refsect2.para: Each stage will attempt to be compiled and attached to shader . Then the shader will be linked. On error, NULL will be returned and error will contain the details of the error.
Note: must be called in the GL thread

entry.para: a NULL terminated list of GstGLSLStage's

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new shader with the specified stages.

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_new_with_stages ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstGLShader * gst_gl_shader_new_with_stages (GstGLContext *context, GError **error, ...);
refsect2.para: Each stage will attempt to be compiled and attached to shader . On error, NULL will be returned and error will contain the details of the error.
Note: must be called in the GL thread

entry.para: a NULL terminated list of GstGLSLStage's

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new shader with the specified stages.

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_use ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gst_gl_shader_use (GstGLShader *shader);
refsect2.para: Mark's shader as being used for the next GL draw command.
Note: must be called in the GL thread and shader must have been linked.

refsect2.title: gst_gl_context_clear_shader ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gst_gl_context_clear_shader (GstGLContext *context);
refsect2.para: Clear's the currently set shader from the GL state machine.
Note: must be called in the GL thread.

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_get_program_handle ()
refsect2.programlisting: int gst_gl_shader_get_program_handle (GstGLShader *shader);

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GL program handle for this shader

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_release ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gst_gl_shader_release (GstGLShader *shader);
refsect2.para: Releases the shader and stages.
Note: must be called in the GL thread
Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_release_unlocked ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gst_gl_shader_release_unlocked (GstGLShader *shader);
refsect2.para: Releases the shader and stages.
Note: must be called in the GL thread
Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_attach ()
refsect2.para: Attaches stage to shader . stage must have been successfully compiled with gst_glsl_stage_compile().
Note: must be called in the GL thread

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: whether stage could be attached to shader

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_attach_unlocked ()
refsect2.para: Attaches stage to shader . stage must have been successfully compiled with gst_glsl_stage_compile().
Note: must be called in the GL thread

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: whether stage could be attached to shader

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_compile_attach_stage ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_gl_shader_compile_attach_stage (GstGLShader *shader, GstGLSLStage *stage, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Compiles stage and attaches it to shader .
Note: must be called in the GL thread

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: whether stage could be compiled and attached to shader

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_detach ()
refsect2.para: Detaches stage from shader . stage must have been successfully attached to shader with gst_gl_shader_attach() or gst_gl_shader_attach_unlocked().
Note: must be called in the GL thread
Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_detach_unlocked ()
refsect2.para: Detaches stage from shader . stage must have been successfully attached to shader with gst_gl_shader_attach() or gst_gl_shader_attach_unlocked().
Note: must be called in the GL thread
Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_is_linked ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_gl_shader_is_linked (GstGLShader *shader);
refsect2.para: Note: must be called in the GL thread

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: whether shader has been successfully linked

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8

refsect2.title: gst_gl_shader_link ()
refsect2.para: Links the current list of GstGLSLStage's in shader .
Note: must be called in the GL thread

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: whether shader could be linked together.

refsect2.para: Since: 1.8
